properties.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 12:10PM MST until February 7 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Northern El Paso County.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slick and snowpacked road conditions. The
hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts may be highly variable
with heavier amounts occuring under the heavy snow bands. This
will result in rapidly changing road conditions over short
distances.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING
